item.title: Shops and npcs!
item.dc:creator: @pablo2 pablo2
item.description:
@pablo2 wrote:

nooo dont put that in =/

go to shops.cfg
and right click open with- click notepad

now there is a list of your shops simply shange the type but only the names for now m8

to change the amount go to item.cfg and do the same but this time
it should have number change them numbers to your price don’t change the id. the id is the first numbers dont mess with them at all.
